step_feedback.feedback: Your arm was mostly straight overhead, but try to feel a bit more resistance. Keep your palm and fingers wide open.
You made a good fist and tightened your muscles while inhaling. Focus on making your fist as tight as possible.
You opened your hand and relaxed your muscles while exhaling. Try to open your fingers even wider to maximize the pumping action.
You are visualizing fluid being pumped out. Continue to focus on opening your hand wide with each exhale.

exercise_summary: Great job with the overhead pumping! Remember to stretch your arm fully overhead and open your hand wide on each exhale. Squeeze tightly into a fist as you inhale to help move fluid.
